price: 9. Oo dhadhamisay cidhib xumadii arrinkeeda, cidhibteedana ku dambeysey khasaaro.
arabic: فَذَاقَتۡ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهَا وَكَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ أَمۡرِهَا خُسۡرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fadhāqat wabāla amrihā wakāna ʿāqibatu amrihā khus'ran
